Kijiji Ontario > Toronto (GTA) > City of Toronto > real estate > apartments, condos > bachelor/studio > Ad ID 347381460

Spacious bachelor in luxurious building at Yonge and Queen
  •     Watch
  • |
  • Share
  • |
  • Print
  • |
  • Report Ad   
Date Listed 15-Mar-12
Price $1,350.00
Address Toronto, ON M5B 2R3, Canada
View map
Bathrooms (#) 1 bathroom
For Rent By Owner
Furnished Yes
Pet Friendly No
Spacious bachelor right in the heart of the city, furnished with basic furniture, walk to everything : Dundas or Queen subway station, Eaton Center, Ryerson University, St Michael Hospital, financial district, shops, restaurants, theatres. All utilities are included (heat, hydro, water). Spacious 463 sqft on high floor with unobstructed west view. Granite kitchen counter top, modern lay out, wood laminate flooring, 24 hours concierge. Available February 16, 2012. Minimum 1 year lease.

Visits: 170

Offers: Ads with a price may include the option to make an offer to the poster. Offers made are non-binding. The poster receives offer details once it is made. The poster may or may not respond to an offer.
